name: World of Virtual Reality VR
description:
••It is a Early Access Game••
The price will increase for each new feature until it's completely finished.

World of VR allows you to play in Different World's and Game Categories.

The Start World is a Multiplayer World with Voice-Chat. You are able to choose going Online or just play Offline!
We work on more Worlds to be Multiplayer like Desert 2 or The Space.
Online mode may currently contain minor bugs.

•There Are Already 8 Different Implemented World's:

•-• Start World
•Choosing walking through Portals in to the Worlds you desire to play.
•possibility to Go Online and Talk to other Players (maybe with little bugs,we work on to improve the Online System)

•-• The Hospital of Death! (finished 40/100)
•In near future you are going to select two different LookMotion Systems, Walking in real World or by pressing the TouchPad Up!
•For now Walk by pressing the TouchPad Up to move around!
•Experience here the pure Horror!

•-• Mount EVR (Winter Mountain World) (finished10/100)
•In new future you get chased and attacked by Zombies in waves! Defend yourself with Weapons or Sword & Shield !
•Now the Zombies are only standing and can get killed by the weapons arround you. You can find the Weapons around you in the World.

•-•Enter the Boxing Fun World(finished 15/100)
•You can punch here nearly everything you want :) makes a lot of Fun !
•This world is a playground for children too :)

•-• LongBow Tower Castle Defense(finished 15/100)
•For now a wave of Enemy's is attacking your Castle, try to defend your Castle with a LongBow. Maybe sometimes you have to get an better angel, use the teleporting Portals.
•More Waves get Included in near Future!

•-•ZombieCalyptica(finished 15/100)
•You are in an abandoned area. Its at Night. And Zombies are Spawning through a Portal. They Can see you only if you are nearby. Try to survive them.

•-• The Space(finished 15/100)
•Here is nearly Zero Gravity! Just look around and walk around!
•Until now 3 Diffrent Space Laser Weapons!
•In near time You have to kill flying Aircrafts with you Laser Weapons!
•Explore the World how its is with zero Gravity! And Just Fight here against the Aircrafts if you activate this Mod!

• - • Desert 2 and Desert (finished 10/100)
• You may remember the Shooter Map created by Valve. Name "Dust 2". We built the world here for you. Everything, of course, in VR. At the moment it is not possible to start real laps. And to play against the bots. But we're working at full speed and we're trying to do that for you as soon as possible.
• So far 3 different pistols! More weapons coming soon!


-•Coming Soon Worlds:
- Soccer World
- Fighting with LaserSwords
- Fun World Do everything you want here with all Weapons and things you desire :)
- Shooter World in PVP! in Multiplayer! Now the worlds Desert2 and Desert !
- Basketball
- Feed the Fish and make him BIGGGG !


-•Coming Soon Features:
- Multiplayer in some Worlds
- Talking and Speaking World at the moment it is the Start World!
- Highscores and Rankings
